title: Warring Kingdoms Rengar & Sion !
body:
**Rengar**
http://i.imgur.com/nJFNf5S.png

Frontal dagger so it can be seen, it's supposed to be wielded like the original back facing blade. Photoshop does wonders :D

**Sion**
http://i.imgur.com/ouy5Vdz.png
Just changed the skin color, photoshop photoshop!

***
Looking forward to your animation suggestions!

Edit! 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ezwM6ChrNx4&list=PLM0Gn_aQK94MWJVUCS_cUlqll_TJhamOt&index=19 
I forgot to add a login theme '.'

replies.body: Finally a Sion skin i would actually buy!
what about barbarian? that one is pretty great.Its a good change of pace when every other sion skin is a zombie like the base sion....

> [{quoted}](name=PhantasmalKing,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=g4YkTflZ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-12-29T16:40:44.659+0000)
>
> what about barbarian? that one is pretty great.Its a good change of pace when every other sion skin is a zombie like the base sion....

Barbarian just doesnt feel all that great in game. Just feels like a tan recolor with a helmet. Something that feels empowering and fresh is what he needs.

It's the splash man. It doesn't give his beard justice. 

If they could only update one Sion splash, I'd hope it would be barbarian.
These are skin worthy.
Nice IGN! Sounds like a Rengar main :o

> [{quoted}](name=NayNays,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=g4YkTflZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-12-29T16:15:14.698+0000)
>
> Nice IGN! Sounds like a Rengar main :o

Yea I used to play a lot of Rengar. I got kinda got bored of him.

The Predator movie inspired my name. "El cazador trofeo de los hombres" means the demon who makes trophies of men." Favorite line in the film lol, other than, "GET TO DE CHOPPA! NOAWWW!!!"

PS. That "Tiger Rengar" drawing is better than the last two Rengar skins concepts that were released. They should hire you lol.

> 不需要谷歌翻譯

Well played, OP.
The Rengar one is amazing!
ty!
MENG HUO!!! I LOVE IT.
I would pay a good chunk of change for these
beautiful {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}
I think the Rengar one is really cool!!! I think the sword should be claws like in the other hand to give more of a Rengar beasty feeling. I really love these skins!!!!{{champion:107}}
Definitely that Sion one... I wants it... >:/
that sion skin is instabuy
When you translate that last option with google translate though...
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Sion concept is legit. I would add a gem in the demon's (dragon's? lion's?) mouth to keep that glow from the original model. Maybe a deep blue or purple to match the scheme?
Ooo! That's not a bad suggestion, I may add it later.
i just want a pre death sion skin before anything else.
Anyone else think the thumbnail looked more something like 'Man Mode Macho Man Heimerdinger the Barbarian'?
Hahaha lol yes
